input: This article outlines the key legal principles to consider when creating a contract. It explains the importance of detailing the scope and purpose of both parties’ obligations, as well as listing any warranties and liabilities of both parties.
output: Creating a contract requires consideration of several legal principles. It is important to define the scope and purpose of both parties’ obligations, as well as list any warranties and liabilities. In this way, both parties are able to understand their respective roles and responsibilities in the contract.
